## How We'll Connect

---
- **[Slack](https://join.slack.com/t/cu-prospectives-2023/shared_invite/zt-1nfzok5hu-wkXKIhPSPQ3LiVqdVDjwkg){target="_blank"}**: Ongoing support
- **Kumospace**: Social events (links vary by event; see [Schedule](/schedule) page)
- **Zoom**: Individual and group meetings (links vary by meeting; see [Schedule](/schedule) page for group meetings and your email for individual meetings)

For more information on these tools, see the [Resources](/resources) page.

We also encourage you to view our welcome video just below, check out our [Virtual Tours](/tour), or take a look at our department's adorable [Pets and Mascots](/pets).
